I think that a transwarp gateway opened, much like in BW and sent them back=
 in time 4 million years, and then they awoke in their present, but on Eart=
h.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: minime_316@... 
  To: nb=
wrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, October 05, 2000 3:14 PM
  Subject: Re:=
 Maximals


  Vulois

  Vulois was shocked at what he hear. Battera, workin=
g for the 
  Alliance? And Cybershark too! This must have been what Convix =
said 
  about a new mission. But he couldn't take it. He needed to go to 
 =
 Cybertron. He would try once more to reach Battera, and if their was 
  no=
 reaction, he would leave her to do what she wanted with her life.

  "Batt=
era, listent to yourself! They've done something to you! You are 
  not an =
Alliance soldier! You are an emissairy of peace, an ex-
  Predacon and my f=
riend! Please remember Battera! You shouldn't be 
  like this."

  That's w=
hen he noticed the chip on her arm. He reached for it, but it 
  shocked hi=
m with high voltage. It had frazzled some of his wires. He 
  looked at her=
.

  "What...what have they done to you?"

  Vulois fell to the ground at h=
er feet, in stasis lock because of the 
  damage the pulse sent to his head=
.
  ______________________________________________________________________
=
  Gotron

  Gotron stared at the probe intensly.

  "So how do we get it ba=
ck to base?"
  ____________________________________________________________=
__________
  Brix/Fliq

  Brix and Fliq counted the numbers.

  "Alright! W=
e out number The Trainers now. Come on, what are we 
  waiting for! It's ti=
me for battle!"
  _________________________________________________________=
_____________
  Starscream

  Starscream arrived at the ruins of the Predac=
on cave, watching the 
  Lavacons come after him.

  "Alright Phobia, where=
 are you?"

  He still didn't completly trust Phobia. He did a little more =
than 
  before, but he still couldn't rule out the possibility of a double-=

  agent. He had to be on his toes as this plan began.
  __________________=
____________________________________________________
  Prebon

  Prebon saw=
 the look of worry on Spears' face.

  "Don't worry. If he ever did anythin=
g to you, he would be a hunted 
  bot for the rest of his life. Even if it =
would spawn millions of 
  years, I would hunt hin down for what he did. Ju=
st stay close and 
  nothing will happen."

  He contined walking.

  (Ples=
e excuse this, but I have a question. I didn't watch G1 very 
  much, and s=
o if this is a really dumb question please don't laugh. 
  But, the way I k=
now it, The Ark crashed, and than a few million years 
  later were awaken.=
 But than wouldn't they have greatly out-dated 
  technology? In the movie =
when they were with other bots from 
  Cybertron they looked no different. =
I would expect at least some 
  subtle changes. What's with that?)
